discord-settings.owner-id: long string of numbers representing owner's ID on Discord
discord-settings.server-id: long string of numbers representing server's ID on Discord
discord-settings.home-channel-id: long string of numbers representing main channel's ID on Discord

twitch-settings.default-discord-relay-channel-id: long string of numbers representing channel on Discord to relay text to

hitbox-settings.default-discord-relay-channel-id: long string of numbers representing channel on Discord to relay text to

hlds-settings.default-discord-relay-channel-id: long string of numbers representing channel on Discord to relay text to
